snippet: There were initial reports of gunfire, but the police said it was the sound of breaking glass during a jewelry heist that sent people scrambling at the mall in Riverside on Sunday night.
lead_paragraph: There were initial reports of gunfire, but the police said it was the sound of breaking glass during a jewelry heist that sent people scrambling at the mall in Riverside on Sunday night.

headline.main: Police Lock Down California Mall After Noise Panics Shoppers
